channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security

item.title: CVE-2021-25245|2024-08-03T19:56:11.061Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20worry-free%20business%20security
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability in Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 could allow an unauthenticated user to obtain various pieces of settings informaiton.

item.title: CVE-2022-23805|2024-08-03T03:51:45.989Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20worry-free%20business%20security
item.description: A security out-of-bounds read information disclosure vulnerability in Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security Server could allow a local attacker to send garbage data to a specific named pipe and crash the server. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-25244|2024-08-03T19:56:11.102Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20worry-free%20business%20security
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability in Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 could allow an unauthenticated user to obtain various pieces of configuration informaiton.
